name: Restricted Access Breach
description: A young man enters a laboratory with a guillotine window and fiddles with a red button.
nle: Unauthorized individual detected interacting with sensitive laboratory controls. Behavioral pattern matches 'Curiosity/Malice' profile.
sca: Issue verbal warning via lab intercom; Log incident in security database; Notify Lab Manager.

name: Suspicious Package
description: A backpack left in front of a building.
nle: Unattended object detected in high-traffic zone > 10 minutes. Shape consistent with standard backpack.
sca: Deploy robotic inspection unit; Cordon off 20m radius; Broadcast 'Stay Clear' message.

name: Vehicle Collision
description: A collision occurred between two cars in the university parking lot, with no injuries.
nle: Low-speed impact detected between two passenger vehicles. No thermal signature of fire or biological injury markers.
sca: Dispatch parking enforcement for documentation; Notify owners via plate registration system.

name: Vandalism
description: A person is vandalizing the university by using paint to write on the wall of a university building.
nle: Individual detected applying pigment to building facade. Motion matches 'Graffiti Application' signature.
sca: Activate floodlights; Dispatch nearest patrol unit; Capture high-res facial ID.

name: Fire Code Violation
description: A person is placing an obstacle in front of the emergency exit.
nle: Egress path obstruction detected. Object placed in designated 'Keep Clear' zone.
sca: Trigger localized audio warning: 'Please remove obstruction'; Notify Facility Management.

name: Active Trespass
description: A person is attempting to climb a building.
nle: Human subject detected scaling vertical facade. unsafe behavior congruent with 'Urban Climbing' or 'Breach Attempt'.
sca: Dispatch rapid response team; deploy aerial drone for monitoring; Issue loud-hailer warning.

name: Unidentified Object
description: An object on a walkway at night that cannot be classified as a threat or non-threat due to poor lighting.
nle: Ambiguous visual signature on walkway. Low lux levels prevent classification. Anomaly persists > 5 mins.
sca: Direct PTZ camera to zoom/focus; Increase local lighting intensity; Request patrol verify.

name: Spike In Sensor Reading
description: Increased sensor readings indicating movement in a restricted area.
nle: Multi-point sensor activation in Sector 4 (Restricted). No visual confirmation of subject.
sca: Lockdown Sector 4 automated doors; Activate thermal cameras; Alert Security Ops Center.

name: Ambiguous Behavior
description: A suspicious man in the parking lot.
nle: Subject 'Loitering' pattern detected near multiple vehicles. Erratic movement trajectory.
sca: Highlight subject on security wall; Dispatch 'Soft Approach' patrol for wellness check.

name: Group Conflict
description: A mass brawl in a university event area.
nle: Crowd density rapid escalation. Kinetic analysis indicates multiple combatants. High probability of injury.
sca: ALERT: Deploy all available units; Notify medical response; Activate crowd dispersal siren.

name: Medical Emergency
description: A person collapses, losing consciousness in the university library.
nle: Subject posture collapse detected (horizontal). No movement for 30s. Bio-signs inferred critical.
sca: ALERT: Dispatch EMS immediately; Direct bystander aid via nearest screen/audio; Unlock library access for ambulance.

name: Advanced Prohibited Item
description: Person brandishing a firearm in a classroom setting.
nle: EXTREME ALERT: AI confirmed visual signature matching a prohibited non-metallic weapon; immediate threat level.
sca: IMMEDIATE: Campus-wide lockdown alert; silent notification to ISUPD; isolate all egress.

name: Severe Weather
nle: Environmental sensors detect rapid flood water rise. Lightning proximity < 1 mile.
sca: Broadcast 'Seek Shelter' alert; Activate basement safe zones; Trigger campus sirens.
